verses.name: Numbers 18:10
verses.text: In the most holy place shalt thou eat it; every male shall eat it: it shall be holy unto thee.

verses.name: Numbers 18:11
verses.text: And this is thine; the heave offering of their gift, with all the wave offerings of the children of Israel: I have given them unto thee, and to thy sons and to thy daughters with thee, by a statute for ever: every one that is clean in thy house shall eat of it.
